system.description: The character uses their size and momentum to devastating effect when charging smaller opponents.
system.benefit: When Character makes a Charge Action against a Target with a Size Trait Smaller than their own, they can make a +0 Opposed Strength Test against the target as a Free Action. If successful the target suffers -30 to Dodge or Parry the attack.

rollConfig.description: Opposed Strength test when charging smaller foes

specialAbilities.name: Overwhelming Charge
specialAbilities.description: When charging smaller foes, make Opposed Strength test as Free Action. On success, target suffers -30 to Dodge or Parry.
